h(z)=11+e−z[Logistic Function]LCE(y,h(z))=−[ylog⁡h(z)+(1−y)log⁡(1−h(z))][Cross Entropy Loss]wi=wi−α×∂∂wiLCE(yi,h(zi))[Weight Update]=wi−α×(xi(h(zi)−yi))w=w−α×1B∑i=1Bxi(h(zi)−yi)[Batch Weight Update]\begin{aligned} h(z) &= \frac{1}{1 + e^{-z}} & [\text{Logistic Function}] \\ L_{\text{CE}}(y, h(z)) &= -\left[y\log h(z) + (1-y)\log(1-h(z))\right] & [\text{Cross Entropy Loss}] \\ w_i &= w_i - \alpha \times \frac{\partial}{\partial w_i} L_{\text{CE}}(y_i, h(z_i)) & [\text{Weight Update}]\\ &= w_i - \alpha \times (x_i (h(z_i) - y_i)) \\ w &= w - \alpha \times \frac{1}{B}\sum^{B}_{i=1} x_i (h(z_i) - y_i) & [\text{Batch Weight Update}]\\ \end{aligned}h(z)LCE​(y,h(z))wi​w​=1+e−z1​=−[ylogh(z)+(1−y)log(1−h(z))]=wi​−α×∂wi​∂​LCE​(yi​,h(zi​))=wi​−α×(xi​(h(zi​)−yi​))=w−α×B1​i=1∑B​xi​(h(zi​)−yi​)​[Logistic Function][Cross Entropy Loss][Weight Update][Batch Weight Update]​

Derivative of Logistic Function

∂∂zh(z)=∂∂z11+e−z=∂∂z(1+e−z)−1=−(1+e−z)−2(∂∂z1+e−z)=−(1+e−z)−2(∂∂ze−z)=−(1+e−z)−2(e−z∂∂z−z)=−(1+e−z)−2(−e−z)=e−z(1+e−z)2=e−z(1+e−z)1(1+e−z)=(1+e−z(1+e−z)−1(1+e−z))1(1+e−z)=(1−1(1+e−z))1(1+e−z)=(1−h(z))h(z)\begin{aligned} \frac{\partial}{\partial z} h(z) &= \frac{\partial}{\partial z} \frac{1}{1+e^{-z}} \\ &= \frac{\partial}{\partial z} (1 + e^{-z})^{-1} \\ &= -(1 + e^{-z})^{-2} \left(\frac{\partial}{\partial z} 1 + e^{-z}\right) \\ &= -(1 + e^{-z})^{-2} \left(\frac{\partial}{\partial z} e^{-z}\right) \\ &= -(1 + e^{-z})^{-2} \left(e^{-z} \frac{\partial}{\partial z} -z\right) \\ &= -(1 + e^{-z})^{-2} (-e^{-z})\\ &= \frac{e^{-z}}{(1+e^{-z})^2} \\ &= \frac{e^{-z}}{(1+e^{-z})}\frac{1}{(1 + e^{-z})}\\ &= \left(\frac{1+e^{-z}}{(1+e^{-z})} - \frac{1}{(1+e^{-z})}\right)\frac{1}{(1 + e^{-z})}\\ &= \left(1 - \frac{1}{(1+e^{-z})}\right)\frac{1}{(1 + e^{-z})}\\ &= (1-h(z))h(z)\\ \end{aligned}∂z∂​h(z)​=∂z∂​1+e−z1​=∂z∂​(1+e−z)−1=−(1+e−z)−2(∂z∂​1+e−z)=−(1+e−z)−2(∂z∂​e−z)=−(1+e−z)−2(e−z∂z∂​−z)=−(1+e−z)−2(−e−z)=(1+e−z)2e−z​=(1+e−z)e−z​(1+e−z)1​=((1+e−z)1+e−z​−(1+e−z)1​)(1+e−z)1​=(1−(1+e−z)1​)(1+e−z)1​=(1−h(z))h(z)​

Derivative of Logistic Function with respect to weight wiw_iwi​

zi=wi×xi∂∂wizi=∂∂wiwi×xi=xi∂∂wih(zi)=∂zi∂wi∂h(zi)∂zi=xi(1−h(zi))h(zi)\begin{aligned} z_i &= w_i \times x_i \\ \frac{\partial}{\partial w_i} z_i &= \frac{\partial}{\partial w_i} w_i \times x_i\\ &= x_i\\ \frac{\partial}{\partial w_i} h(z_i) &= \frac{\partial z_i}{\partial w_i}\frac{\partial h(z_i)}{\partial z_i} \\ &= x_i (1 - h(z_i)) h(z_i)\\ \end{aligned}zi​∂wi​∂​zi​∂wi​∂​h(zi​)​=wi​×xi​=∂wi​∂​wi​×xi​=xi​=∂wi​∂zi​​∂zi​∂h(zi​)​=xi​(1−h(zi​))h(zi​)​

Derivative of Cross Entropy Loss with respect to weight wiw_iwi​

∂∂wiLCE(yi,h(zi))=∂∂wi−[yilog⁡h(zi)+(1−yi)log⁡(1−h(zi))]=−[yi∂∂wilog⁡h(zi)+(1−yi)∂∂wilog⁡(1−h(zi))]=−[yih(zi)∂∂wih(zi)+(1−yi)(1−h(zi))∂∂wi(1−h(zi))]=−[yih(zi)∂∂wih(zi)−(1−yi)(1−h(zi))∂∂wih(zi)]=−[∂∂wih(zi)(yih(zi)−(1−yi)(1−h(zi)))]=−[xi(1−h(zi))h(zi)(yih(zi)−(1−yi)(1−h(zi)))]=−[xi(yi(1−h(zi))−(1−yi)h(zi))]=−[xi(yi−h(zi))]=xi(h(zi)−yi)\begin{aligned} \frac{\partial}{\partial w_i} L_{\text{CE}}(y_i, h(z_i)) &= \frac{\partial}{\partial w_i} -\left[y_i \log h(z_i) + (1-y_i) \log (1-h(z_i))\right]\\ &= -\left[ y_i \frac{\partial}{\partial w_i} \log h(z_i) + (1-y_i) \frac{\partial}{\partial w_i} \log (1 - h(z_i)) \right]\\ &= -\left[ \frac{y_i}{h(z_i)} \frac{\partial}{\partial w_i} h(z_i) + \frac{(1-y_i)}{(1-h(z_i))} \frac{\partial}{\partial w_i} (1 - h(z_i)) \right]\\ &= -\left[ \frac{y_i}{h(z_i)} \frac{\partial}{\partial w_i} h(z_i) - \frac{(1-y_i)}{(1-h(z_i))} \frac{\partial}{\partial w_i} h(z_i)\right]\\ &= -\left[ \frac{\partial}{\partial w_i} h(z_i) \left(\frac{y_i}{h(z_i)} - \frac{(1-y_i)}{(1-h(z_i))}\right)\right]\\ &= -\left[ x_i(1-h(z_i))h(z_i) \left(\frac{y_i}{h(z_i)} - \frac{(1-y_i)}{(1-h(z_i))}\right)\right]\\ &= -\left[ x_i \left(y_i(1-h(z_i)) - (1-y_i)h(z_i)\right)\right]\\ &= -\left[ x_i (y_i - h(z_i))\right]\\ &= x_i (h(z_i) - y_i) \\ \end{aligned}∂wi​∂​LCE​(yi​,h(zi​))​=∂wi​∂​−[yi​logh(zi​)+(1−yi​)log(1−h(zi​))]=−[yi​∂wi​∂​logh(zi​)+(1−yi​)∂wi​∂​log(1−h(zi​))]=−[h(zi​)yi​​∂wi​∂​h(zi​)+(1−h(zi​))(1−yi​)​∂wi​∂​(1−h(zi​))]=−[h(zi​)yi​​∂wi​∂​h(zi​)−(1−h(zi​))(1−yi​)​∂wi​∂​h(zi​)]=−[∂wi​∂​h(zi​)(h(zi​)yi​​−(1−h(zi​))(1−yi​)​)]=−[xi​(1−h(zi​))h(zi​)(h(zi​)yi​​−(1−h(zi​))(1−yi​)​)]=−[xi​(yi​(1−h(zi​))−(1−yi​)h(zi​))]=−[xi​(yi​−h(zi​))]=xi​(h(zi​)−yi​)​
